Package org.jivesoftware.smackx.workgroup.agent

Interface Summary
OfferListener An interface which all classes interested in hearing about chat offers associated to a particular WorkgroupSession instance should implement.
QueueAgentsListener  
QueueUsersListener  
 

Class Summary
Agent An agent represents the agent role in a workgroup queue.
Offer A class embodying the semantic agent chat offer; specific instances allow the acceptance or rejecting of the offer.
RevokedOffer A revoked offer which contains the reason the offer was revoked, the workgroup, the user JID, and the timestamp of the revocation.
WorkgroupQueue A queue in a workgroup, which is a pool of agents that are routed a specific type of chat request.
WorkgroupQueue.Status Represents the status of the queue.
WorkgroupSession This class embodies the agent's active presence within a given workgroup.
